summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2274, for the improvement of the alley in block 15, Denny-Fuhman Addition, all in the City of Seattle, being the alley from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street and between North Broadway and Harvard Avenue North, by grading and paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 23441 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
